channel.title: [718] Autocast

item.title: [718] Autocast
item.dc:creator: @iTanner iTanner
item.description:
@iTanner wrote:

Basically this is going to sound very weird but we all have our ideas.

Alright all of my mage works right.

I wanted to add a .50 second delay to the start of autocast tho.

E.x: I selected autocast, click to attack, waits .50 and then starts casting like normal. I didnâ€™t really know where to change this so I went here

public int getSpellId() { Integer tempCastSpell = (Integer) player.getTemporaryAttributtes().get( "tempCastSpell"); if (tempCastSpell != null) return tempCastSpell + 256; return autoCastSpell; }

and I tried adding an action delay making it look like this

public int getSpellId() { Integer tempCastSpell = (Integer) player.getTemporaryAttributtes().get( "tempCastSpell"); player.getActionManager().setActionDelay(1); if (tempCastSpell != null) return tempCastSpell + 256; return autoCastSpell; }

That just makes you constantly look towards your target.

thanks

Read full topic
